quote.quote: Life is only a long and bitter suicide, and faith alone can transform this suicide into a sacrifice.
In any great organization it is far,far safer to be wrong with the majority than to be right alone.
The perfection of Christian character depends wholly upon the grace and strength found alone in god
Bitterness is like cancer. It eats upon the host. But anger is like fire. It burns it all clean.
Anger is not always bad, sometimes it is your only option.
I don’t have an attitude problem, I have a personality you can’t handle.
Finding a love like yours feels like a dream. Please don't wake me up!
I read a lot of books, but our love story is my favorite.
Every day, every month, and every year... I love you more than the last.
It makes a big difference in your life when you stay positive.
Building a positive attitude begins with having confidence in yourself.
Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking.
Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
True Love story is like a beard of men. It never ends, it only grows..!!
Love your man love his beard
I don’t have many hobbies, but my beard collects bras.
The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
Money and success don’t change people; they merely amplify what is already there.
It wasn’t until I went to college and I got the first motorcycle that I understood the thrill of speed.
I believe there are two periods in life, one for the bike, the other for becoming active on one’s work.
God didn’t create metal so that man could make paper clips!
Today a true queen was born and I’m so happy to be in your court.
Happy birthday to my gorgeous, smart, and loyal friend. Live your best life!
Without you, my therapy bills would be outrageous! Happy birthday, BFF.
No matter how busy you are, you must take time to make the other person feel important.
America is not just a country, it's an idea, and real Americans are getting busy.
Some people are so busy learning the tricks of the trade that they never learn the trade.
